EmailTemplate.name: Damaged/Defective Replacement Completed template
EmailTemplate.subject: Request to replace {!FS_Execution_Plan__c.FS_Type_of_Replacement__c} Completed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
A request to replace {!FS_Execution_Plan__c.FS_Type_of_Replacement__c} has been completed.
Click this link https://freestyle.my.salesforce.com to open the FET site. Then click {!FS_Execution_Plan__c.Link} to be directed to the specific record referenced above.
